channel.title: How to add the "Royale","Zune", and "Royale Noir" theme to Win XP pro
channel.description:
This tut will give you the "Royale" theme and one other "Royale noir"
Step 1: Download the file attached as Royale noir Step 2: Extract it to C:\windows\resources\themes\royale noir Step 3: Double click on the file luna.msstyles Step 4: Select the color scheme you like Step 5: Complete!
Method 2: This will install the theme "Zune" on your computer (the finished Royale Noir theme)
Step 1: Download and install the attached zune installer.zip Step 2: Complete
Credits: http://www.istartedsomething.com/20061029/royale-noir/ for the Royale Noir zip and instructions for installing
Screenshots: [URL=http://img103.imageshack.us/my.php?image=zuneyb2.png][IMG]http://img103.imageshack.us/img103/1438/zuneyb2.th.png[/img][/URL] the start menu was modded by me and does not change upon installation of this theme(S) this screenshot was of Zune Note: You DO NOT have to mod the UXtheme.dll to run this theme as it is by Microsoft. VirusScan thanks to Jotti: [URL=http://img516.imageshack.us/my.php?image=resultsug3.png][IMG]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/977/resultsug3.th.png[/img][/URL]
